Job Title: Planning & Scheduling Manager

Job Description

  • Oversee the development, preparation, and maintenance of the company’s master project schedule and production. - Lead and develop a team of 3+ Production Planners/Schedulers. - Establish, measure, monitor, and adjust capacity levels to execute all manufacturing and engineering design schedules. - Determine job readiness in all areas, including engineering, material status, and production capacity, prior to starting a project in production. - Utilize ERP systems, planning and scheduling software, or other database tools to develop and maintain master schedules and production. - Interpret and follow written directions, blueprints, and engineering diagrams. - Establish KPIs and report on performance relative to the production plan. - Engage in capacity management during sales and operations planning, master scheduling, materials requirements planning, and production activity control.

Hard Skills

  • Bachelor's Degree in Engineering Discipline or Supply Chain
  • 5 years experience in manufacturing environment
  • 2 years experience in operations management, project management, or engineering

Job Type

This is a permanent position.

Work Site

This is a fully on-site position in Fontana, California.

Work Environment

Manufacturing Sheet Metal fabrication shop

About Actalent

Actalent is a global leader in engineering and sciences services and talent solutions. We help visionary companies advance their engineering and science initiatives through access to specialized experts who drive scale, innovation and speed to market. With a network of almost 30,000 consultants and more than 4,500 clients across the U.S., Canada, Asia and Europe, Actalent serves many of the Fortune 500.
